system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Order confirmation emails are delayed by several minutes after checkout.

conversation_history.message: We've noticed that after completing a purchase, the order confirmation emails are not sent immediately. There seems to be a delay of up to 10 minutes before customers receive their emails.
Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Jordan. We will investigate the email delay issue and update you as soon as we have more information.
